page.title: 20SOCIAL PROBLEMS IN SEAHAM
page.content: ONE OF THE MAIN PROBLEMS IN SEAHAM IS VANDALISM.ALL TOO OFTEN PUBLIC TELEPHONES DO NOT WORK BECAUSE OF VANDALS.SOME YOUTHS DAUB WALLS WITH PAINT OR WRITE ON THEM.PUBLIC PLACES LIKE SCHOOLS ARE A PARTICULAR TARGET.WINDOWS ARE OFTEN BROKEN OR ROOFS ARE DAMAGED BY CHILDREN PLAYING ON THEM.THE COUNCIL STOPPED ERECTING AN ANNUAL CHRISTMAS TREE BECAUSE THE LIGHTS AND TOYS WERE ALWAYS SMASHED. AT DENESIDE SCHOOL WE PLANTED 100 NEW TREES BUT THEY WERE ALL PULLED UP.WE ALL HOPE THAT THE SITUATION WILL IMPROVE. {CHILDREN OF DENESIDE JUNIOR SCHOOL {THE AVENUE {SEAHAM {CO.DURHAM {MAY-JUNE-JULY 1985 {
